content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=01/vehicle_registration_2024-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

--Select data from a folder

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

--Select data from subfolder

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

  --Get data from more than one file  
  SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=01/*',
                'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=03/*'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

--USe more than 1 wildcard character
  SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',                
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

------File metadata function filename()

  SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',                
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    Group by result.filename()
    ORDER BY result.filename();

-- Limit Data using filename() con WHERE

  SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',                
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('vehicle_registration_2024-01.csv','vehicle_registration_2025-01.csv')
    Group by result.filename()
    ORDER BY result.filename();

--Uso de la funcion Filepath () 

 SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.filepath() as file_path,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',                
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('vehicle_registration_2024-01.csv','vehicle_registration_2025-01.csv')
    Group by result.filename(), result.filepath()
    ORDER BY result.filename(), result.filepath();

-----------------------
    SELECT
    result.filepath() as file_path,
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',                
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('vehicle_registration_2024-01.csv','vehicle_registration_2025-01.csv')
    Group by 
    result.filepath() ,
    result.filepath(1) ,
    result.filepath(2) 
    ORDER BY 
    result.filepath() ,
    result.filepath(1) ,
    result.filepath(2) ;

--Usar filepath() en el WHERE (Optimizando la consulta)

 SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',                
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE 
    result.filepath(1) = '2024'
    AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
    GROUP BY result.filepath(1) ,result.filepath(2) 
    ORDER BY result.filepath(1) ,result.filepath(2) ;
